headline: EPAM Systems (NYSE:EPAM) Amends Articles of Association at Recent AGM
summary: EPAM Systems (NYSE:EPAM) announced amendments to its Articles of Association during its AGM on May 22, 2025, which could potentially impact its governance structure. Over the past month, EPAM’s shares rose by 11%, coinciding with positive developments such as expanded strategic collaboration with Amazon Web Services and ongoing share repurchases. Despite broader market indices remaining relatively flat, the company's substantial Q1 earnings report and future revenue guidance might have...
